DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate adherence to treatment in bipolar patients, to characterize patients based on adherence degree and to describe the variables linked to poor adherence to treatment in real-life practice.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Study to Evaluate Adherence to Treatment in Bipolar Disorder: Adherence Study
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with bipolar disorder I or II DSMIV Patients treated with at least one oral antipsychotic Subjects able to read and write Patients participating in clinical trials
